content: Yes, Four Roses Distillery has a gift shop where you can purchase their bourbons, as well as branded merchandise such as glasses, shirts, and hats. At the gift shop, you can purchase bottles of their standard bourbon, as well as some of their limited edition releases, which are only available at the distillery. The staff at the gift shop can also assist you in selecting the right bourbon based on your preferences. However, keep in mind that there might be restrictions on bringing bottles of alcohol onto a flight or across state borders, so it's best to check the rules and regulations before making any purchases.
